parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:
- zh: Chinese
- en: English

parameters.name: DynamicSql
parameters.description: Specifies whether the SQL statement is a dynamic SQL statement.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end time of querying the execution history of the SQL statement.   
The value must be UTC time in the format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the OceanBase cluster.

parameters.name: NodeIp
parameters.description: The IP address of the node.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The start time of querying the execution history of the SQL statement.   
The value must be UTC time in the format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.
